books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The New York lawyer Stone Barrington’s client needs help spending the fortune he won in the lottery, as well as protection from scheming bad guys.
books.name: SEX, LIES  AND SERIOUS MONEY

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: A medical crisis entangles a black nurse, a white supremacist father and a white lawyer.
books.name: SMALL GREAT THINGS

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man who became a single father when his marriage and business collapsed learns to take a chance on a new love.
books.name: TWO BY TWO

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers of the Minnesota Bureau of Criminal Apprehension must deal with the theft of tigers from the local zoo.
books.name: ESCAPE CLAUSE

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: Vince Flynn’s character, the C.I.A. operative Mitch Rapp, uncovers a dangerous Russian plot. Flynn died in 2013.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: ORDER TO KILL

books.author: by Brent Weeks
books.description: The fourth book in the fantasy Lightbringer series follows “The Broken Eye.”
books.name: THE BLOOD MIRROR

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Paul Beatty
books.description: A satirical tale of a man on trial for trying to segregate a school and introduce slavery to his home. Winner of the 2016 Man Booker Prize.
books.name: THE SELLOUT

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: Two families grapple with love, loss and loneliness at the holidays.
books.name: A BAXTER FAMILY CHRISTMAS

books.author: by Lexi Blake
books.description: The doctor who reconditioned Theo seeks to eliminate the woman whose love he can't remember.
books.name: SUBMISSION IS NOT ENOUGH

books.author: by Iris Johansen and Roy Johansen
books.description: When the doctor who gave Kendra her sight disappears, she and an agent for hire head to California.
books.name: NIGHT WATCH

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Myron Bolitar and his friend Win locate a boy who was kidnapped 10 years earlier; the 11th Myron Bolitar novel.
books.name: HOME
